guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
Kill the Goblins you can find in the Dwarven Mines.
You will need Mining 12 for this.
Kill Team Treasurite members in the Crystal Hollows.
They spawn in the Mithril Deposits and you will need
Heart of the Mountain 3 to go there.
Do your daily experiments in the Experimentation Table,
always do the highest tier you can.
Fish next to Chum Buckets and put the Chum
you get from killing fishing mobs in these.
You might want to buy a Chum Rod (and Glowy Chum Bait)
from Moby in the Desert Island.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Optimal tool:
Advanced Gardening Axe (25 copper)
Make a full plot of Cocoa Beans (16716 needed)
in The Garden (SkyBlock Level 5).
You will need Garden Level 8.
Get the Cocoa Beans to plant from The Desert Island.
Wear Mushroom Armor enchanted with Growth 5
during the night.
Growth 5 requires Enchanting Level 5
and costs 50 Experience Levels per piece.
Can be made from Lapis Lazuli Collection 5 (10k),
a drop from fishing, from the Experimentation Table,
and dropped from Ender Nodes in the End (11-13% chance).

note: Apply the Rare Diamond Reforge Stone
guide: Mine Diamonds in the Deep Caverns until
you get a Rare Diamond to apply.
A safe spot to do this is between the Diamond Reserve
and the Obsidian Sanctuary (-20 27 70).
Mobs don't spawn there.

note: Kill 25 Goblins during a Goblin Raid
guide: Kill Goblins in the Goblin Burrows (-100 163 150)
while an event is going on.
You need Mining Level 12 to visit the required island.
Do your daily commissions in the Dwarven Mines
(4 per day). You will need Mining 12 to go there.
You can also easily do it all in one day, though the
HOTM XP is reduced after the first 4 a day.
Can also be completed in the Crystal Hollows,
though it is harder unless you get a Pickonimbus.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Jungle Island (/warp jungle).
You will need Foraging Level 5 to go there.
Place as many minions as you can,
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time (about once every 4h,
or up to every 2h with Tasty Cheese).
You will most likely get this
while going for Garden Level 8
and the Cocoa Beans Collector goal.
Mine emeralds in the Dwarven Mines minecarts above the Bank.
Needs 32 Enchanted Emeralds and Emerald Collection 5.
To speed this up you can utilize Cole's Mining Fiesta
while Jerry is mayor and has Cole's perks active.
Kill Spiders in the Spider's Den (/warp spider)
place a few Cave Spider Minions and participate
in killing Arachne in Arachne's Sanctuary.
Recommended to wear a Cow Head to avoid the poison.
Talk to Jamie in the Hub and
claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right click it to gain +100 Speed.
Or just wait for a splash.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold, Diamond,
Mushroom Armor and Farm Suit.
Craft Angler Armor for the Bingo goal.
Buy a Raider Axe for 130k coins
from the Melancholic Viking in The Park.
Remember: Level 1 Enchantments do count.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Costs 256 Enchanted Oak Wood to craft and
unlocks at Oak Wood Collection 9 (30k).
You can unlock 17/17 Farming Collections,
6/11 Combat Collections, 6/6 Foraging Collections,
14/22 Mining Collections for a total of 43 collections.
You will also get some Fishing Collections.
You will most likely get this from
leveling up skills.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
To summon Arachne you need to place
4 Arachne's Callings in the Altar in
Arachne's Sanctuary. Those drop from slaying
Arachne's Keepers there. You can get away with
only placing one by teaming up with others.
This requires Raw Fish Collection 5.
You should place down a fishing minion
with a medium storage to help with this.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels, and use the Cocoa Beans
from the collection goal to make Enchanted Cookies
and brew Adrenaline Potions with them.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
